resources.string: Are you sure you want to discard changes?

Belaire Rosé is a French sparkling wine produced in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d\'Azur region of the South of France. Officially labelled "Luc Belaire Rare Rosé," the wine is a blend of Syrah, Grenache, and Cinsault grapes typically used in the production of Provencal rosé wines.
